mapper.sql: SELECT sb.plan_number, sb.bom_part, sb.bom_configuration, sb.bom_code, pp.plan_product_name, sbs.bom_material_name, sbs.bom_specifications, sbs.bom_unit, sbs.bom_amount, sbs.bom_material, sbs.bom_note, sb.tree_id, sbs.tree_secondary_id, sbs.plan_quality, sbs.bom_brand, sbs.bom_location, sbs.bom_material_code FROM jr_production_plan pp LEFT JOIN jr_setup_bom sb ON pp.plan_code = sb.plan_number LEFT JOIN jr_setup_bom_schedule sbs ON sb.plan_number = sbs.plan_number WHERE sbs.plan_number = #{setupBomSchedule.planNumber}
SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM jr_setup_bom_schedule sbs WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.select: SELECT pp.id, pp.plan_state, pp.plan_date, pp.plan_number, pp.plan_code, pp.plan_machine_bom FROM jr_production_plan pp WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY pp.plan_voucher_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jr_production_plan_schedule ( plan_order, plan_amount, plan_machine, plan_configuration, plan_cutting, plan_process, plan_other, plan_jig, plan_shape, plan_size, plan_note, plan_attachment, plan_number, plan_date, plan_code ) VALUES ( #{planOrder}, #{planAmount}, #{planMachine}, #{planConfiguration}, #{planCutting}, #{planProcess}, #{planOther}, #{planJig}, #{planShape}, #{planSize}, #{planNote}, #{planAttachment}, #{planNumber}, #{planDate}, #{planCode} )

INSERT INTO jr_production_plan ( plan_state, plan_date, plan_number, plan_customer_name, plan_product_name, plan_specifications, plan_voucher, plan_voucher_date, plan_code, plan_configuration, plan_note, plan_money, plan_unit ) VALUES ( #{planState}, #{planDate}, #{planNumber}, #{planCustomerName}, #{planProductName}, #{planSpecifications}, #{planVoucher}, #{planVoucherDate}, #{planCode}, #{planConfiguration}, #{planNote}, #{planMoney}, #{planUnit} )
mapper.select: SELECT pp.plan_customer_name customerName, pp.plan_date, pps.plan_amount, pps.plan_order, pps.plan_machine, pps.plan_configuration, pps.plan_cutting, pps.plan_process, pps.plan_other, pps.plan_jig, pps.plan_shape, pps.plan_size, pps.plan_note, pps.plan_attachment, pp.plan_number, pp.plan_product_name, pp.plan_specifications, pp.plan_code FROM jr_production_plan pp LEFT JOIN jr_production_plan_schedule pps ON pp.plan_code = pps.plan_code WHERE 1=1 AND pp.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE jr_production_plan set plan_machining= #{productionPlan.planMachining}, plan_assembly= #{productionPlan.planAssembly}, plan_instructions_one= #{productionPlan.planInstructionsOne}, plan_instructions_two= #{productionPlan.planInstructionsTwo}, plan_instructions_three= #{productionPlan.planInstructionsThree} WHERE id=#{productionPlan.id}
mapper.select: SELECT pp.id, pp.plan_machining, pp.plan_assembly, pp.plan_instructions_one, pp.plan_instructions_two, pp.plan_instructions_three, pp.plan_head, pp.plan_expect_date, pp.plan_wage, pp.plan_head_one, pp.plan_expect_date_one, pp.plan_wage_one, pp.plan_content FROM jr_production_plan pp WHERE 1=1 AND pp.id = #{id}

SELECT pp.plan_customer_name customerName, pp.plan_date, pps.plan_amount, pps.plan_order, pps.plan_machine, pps.plan_configuration, pps.plan_cutting, pps.plan_process, pps.plan_other, pps.plan_jig, pps.plan_shape, pps.plan_size, pps.plan_note, pps.plan_attachment, pp.plan_number FROM jr_production_plan pp LEFT JOIN jr_production_plan_schedule pps ON pp.plan_code = pps.plan_code WHERE 1=1 AND pp.plan_code = #{planCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jr_setup_bom_schedule ( bom_code, bom_material_code, bom_material_name, bom_specifications, bom_brand, bom_amount, bom_material, bom_material_amount, bom_note, plan_number, bom_unit, bom_location, tree_secondary_id, plan_machine_bom, plan_quality ) VALUES ( #{bomCode}, #{bomMaterialCode}, #{bomMaterialName}, #{bomSpecifications}, #{bomBrand}, #{bomAmount}, #{bomMaterial}, #{bomMaterialAmount}, #{bomNote}, #{planNumber}, #{bomUnit}, #{bomLocation}, #{treeSecondaryId}, #{planMachineBom}, #{planQuality} )
INSERT INTO jr_setup_bom ( plan_number, bom_part, bom_configuration, bom_code, tree_id ) VALUES ( #{planNumber}, #{bomPart}, #{bomConfiguration}, #{bomCode}, #{treeId} )
mapper.select: SELECT plan_number, bom_part, bom_configuration, bom_code FROM jr_setup_bom WHERE plan_number = #{planCode}

SELECT sb.plan_number, sb.bom_part, sb.bom_configuration, sb.bom_code, pp.plan_product_name, sbs.bom_material_name, sbs.bom_specifications, sbs.bom_unit, sbs.bom_amount, sbs.bom_material, sbs.bom_note, sb.tree_id, sbs.tree_secondary_id FROM jr_production_plan pp LEFT JOIN jr_setup_bom sb ON pp.plan_code = sb.plan_number LEFT JOIN jr_setup_bom_schedule sbs ON sb.plan_number = sbs.plan_number WHERE sbs.plan_number = #{planCode}
SELECT pp.plan_machine_bom FROM jr_production_plan pp WHERE 1=1 AND pp.plan_code = #{planCode}
SELECT pp.id, pp.plan_state, pp.plan_date, pp.plan_number, pp.plan_code, pp.plan_machine_bom FROM jr_production_plan pp WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY pp.plan_machine_bom_date DESC LIMIT 1
